text: Lappajärvi is a municipality in Finland. It had 3,310 people living there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Alajärvi, Evijärvi, Kauhava, Lapua, Veteli and Vimpeli. == Some villages == Mynkelinmäki, Nissi, Itäkylä, Savonkylä, Tarvola and Karvala. == Other websites == * Tervetuloa Lappajärvelle! Category:Municipalities of South Ostrobothnia
title: Lappajärvi
